3.0.name: wordpress/private-community-for-bp-lite
3.0.description: Makes BP and bbPress posts/pages private and only accessable to logged in users with the exception of the posts/pages you set in Dashboard/Settings/PrivateCommunityBP. This version allows 20 unblocked posts/pages and has not been tested for use with multisite installations. You can unblock pages like activity, members, or posts, but not profiles. Blocks RSS feeds to logged out visitors. This version does not unblock entire categories but If you need this functionality contact me here for instructions on purchasing a version that will.
